title: Still not accepted into the PBE?
body:
I applied to join the PBE about 2 years ago, and still haven't been accepted. I don't know why and I really want to play on the PBE.

What am I doing wrong?

replies.body: We can't expedite applications to the PBE, but we have a[ PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) that provides some information on how applicants are selected.  I was able to confirm that your application has been received.  Best of luck getting in!
